tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE claims_processing (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_status VARCHAR(50),
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  update_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  payout_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  report_generated BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE claims (
    claim_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_status VARCHAR(50),
    policy_holder_name VARCHAR(100),
    policy_number VARCHAR(20),
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payout_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE claim_updates (
    update_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id INTEGER REFERENCES claims(claim_id),
    update_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    updated_by VARCHAR(100),
    new_claim_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE payouts (
    payout_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id INTEGER REFERENCES claims(claim_id),
    payout_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payout_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    total_claims INTEGER,
    total_payouts DECIMAL(10, 2),
    total_processed_claims INTEGER
);
